response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe aligns perfectly with your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, we are confident it will bring significant benefits to you. Considering its intrinsic worth and market value, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $1,200,000. This special offer is designed to ensure you receive unparalleled value while allowing us to maintain a competitive edge in the market. We believe this price reflects a fair compromise between the product's true value and your budget, making it an attractive proposition for both parties. Should you decide to proceed, we can arrange for immediate delivery and provide all necessary support to ensure a smooth transaction. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you with excellence. Best regards, Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
